main event: Observers reported a flashing red and blue-green light in the northern sky for about 15 minutes.
interesting points: The light moved across the sky and then left the area after its 15-minute display., The elevation of the identified object corresponded with the position of Arcturus., A civilian witness named Roger Dise, a railroad trainman, was one of the observers., There were no other similar sightings reported immediately after., The sighting was made in clear weather conditions.
